ygData.subject: Equipment Upgrades.....
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a level 43 (almost 44) Bard on Veeshan and I was wondering if anyone could suggest what equipment of mine I should get rid of and what I should replace it
ygData.messageBody:
I am a level 43 (almost 44) Bard on Veeshan and I was wondering if anyone
could suggest what equipment of mine I should get rid of and what I should
replace it with, this is what I am wearing.....

Head - Froglok Crown
Earings - 2 Diamondines
Face - Mask of Deception
Neck - Golden BP Choker
Shoulders - Carnel Pauldrons (from kobold priest)
Breastplate - Mithril
Cloak - Hooded Black Cloak
Vambraces - Lambent
Bracers - Both Serpentine (sigh)
Gloves - Lambent
Rings - 1 x +5 ac +55 hp's and 1 x +5 Str/Dex
Belt - TBB/FBSS
Greaves - Lambent
Boots - Dwarven Work Boots
Weapons - 2 Ykesha

Instruments - Mistmoore Drums, Gypsy Lute, Lute of the Gypsy Princess,
Brass Horn, Flute

Now with this gear I look like a fashion disaster (in woodelf form, Dark
Elf form looks ok). I am keen on suggestions as to what items I should
upgrade or keep and whether anyone has suggestions on new gear (I would
like full mithril, but so would everyone).

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 43 Songs <Guardians of Light>
Meklon, Level 15 Cleric of Innoruuk <Guardians of Light>
Veeshan Server
